scripts.check-formatting: yarn prettier -c . && poetry run yapf -prd . && markdownlint-cli2 '**/*.md' '#node_modules'
scripts.clean-dict: r=(); while IFS=$\n read -r w; do ! rg --no-config -qi. -g '!.vscode/dictionary.txt' -m 1 "$w" . && r+=("$w"); done < .vscode/dictionary.txt; j=$(printf "|%s" "${r[@]}"); j="^(${j:1})$"; grep -Ev "${j}" .vscode/dictionary.txt > new && mv new .vscode/dictionary.txt
scripts.format: yarn prettier -w . && poetry run yapf -pri . && markdownlint-cli2 --fix '**/*.md' '#node_modules'
scripts.gen-docs: poetry run sphinx-build -T -E -b html -d docs/_build/doctrees -D language=en docs docs/_build
scripts.gen-manpage: poetry run sphinx-build -T -E -b man -d docs/_build/doctrees -D language=en docs man
scripts.qa: yarn mypy && yarn ruff && yarn check-spelling && yarn check-formatting
